A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: If this movie wasn't based off the amazing story of the original Star Wars films and plots\, I would have thought this was a terrible movie. I'm sorry but once Leia got blown up in to space and survived\, I was done. Also Snoke? Supreme Leader? Biggest lead up to absolutely nothing I have ever seen. They could have done so much with him. Honestly\, the moment Kylo took of his helmet and I realized that was Adam Driver underneath the helmet\, the entire franchise died for me. TERRIBLE casting move. And I hear fans crying because they said they should have gone in the new direction and not have it like the previous older films. Well yeah I'm all about going in a new direction too as long as it's not completely retarded or full of plot holes. The new direction they took was just bad. I feel like they were playing a game of poker going all in with a hand of 2/5 or 3/9 hoping to get lucky. Whoever is in charge of all these decisions is retarded.
